name: Gatton Park Past and Present Walk, Harewoods

ai.summary: An easy 5.6 km circular stroll through Gatton Park at Harewoods, combining historic parkland, woodland paths and lakes. This gentle route is suitable for families and casual walkers, offering scenic views across water features and well-kept grounds.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-maintained paths and gravel tracks with flat to gently undulating terrain. Expect a mix of grassy lake paths and shaded woodland sections. Some sections may be muddy after rain; wear sturdy, waterproof footwear.
ai.safety_notes: Weather-appropriate clothing and sturdy walking shoes are recommended. Stay on designated paths, watch for cyclists and other visitors, and keep a safe distance from lake edges. Bring water, a small snack, sun protection, and a light waterproof layer. Check park opening hours and be mindful of seasonal restrictions; supervise children and dogs where allowed.
recommended_gear: Map or offline maps on phone

seo.title: Gatton Park Past and Present Walk, Harewoods – Easy 5.6 km Lakes Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Gatton Park’s lakes and historic grounds on an easy 5.6 km circular walk at Harewoods, UK. Practical tips, gear, and best seasons for this scenic stroll.
